CREATED.TITLE: You have created a new token
CREATED.TEXT: Beware, the token is only shown once and cannot be restored. Please save the token before closing:

DELETE.TITLE: Delete token
DELETE.TEXT: You are about to delete {singular, select, true{a token} other{{numberOfTokens} tokens}} ! Beware, this action cannot be undone.

CREATE.SUCCESS: A new token has been created.
CREATE.ERROR: An error occurred while creating a new token.

DELETE.ERROR: {number} {singular, select, true{token has} other{tokens have}} not been deleted.
DELETE.INFO: {number} {singular, select, true{token has} other{tokens have}} been deleted.
